name: Sleepy Daniel
description:
Sleeping quality is important to all of us.
Having a good night of sleep makes you energized to complete your tasks, overcome your obstacles and have fun with your loved ones during the day.
However there are always noisy and inconsiderate neighbors who disrupt your sleep.

In this game, you will play the role of a university student, Daniel. He needs to complete his thesis. At the same time, he has to earn money to pay his rental.
All these tasks require a refreshed mind, however, his noisy neighbors keep him awake at night.

Let's help Daniel to investigate causes of the noise and come up with solutions to reduce it.
Hopefully Daniel can graduate in time without being kicked out by his landlord!
